title: Exporting my pocket list
content:
Hi,

I have sent an email to support but didn't receive an answer yet, so I hope someone here might be able to help me.

So I've been trying to export my Pocket list, but didn't receive any my email.

After going over few of the support articles. I've noticed that my email didn't show up in the settings of Pocket. I have updated the email address, but I am not receiving the confirmation email.

I've tried 3 different email address.

Any idea what can I do? Thanks!
creator: Dati42

title: Firefox killing my Galaxy Book 4 Pro battery life
content: I have a concern where my laptops battery was used 34% in only 48 minutes by firefox. This is a fresh install and a laptop will "all day" battery life.
creator: Buckhunter763

title: Running slow
content: For the last few months I've been getting slow responses with online applications. When I switch to chrome, it all runs at a normal pace. Specifically with " The Customer Factor"
creator: mycarpetcleaning

title: How do I disable Quick Find turning on everytime I press /
content: Whenever I click the / key when not typing, it pops up a quick find menu. This is a issue it interferes when I'm using the calculator
creator: gabriel.hs.kim

title: How to disable automatic translations
content: I'm having some trouble with automatic translations on firefox. I don't know if It's exclusive of firefox, but some websites, mostly wikis, open a "translate" field that automatically creates a new website, wich causes the images and some other stuff on the website to break. I tried disabling the translation on about:config off, as show in some other questions, but it did not work. This is being really annoying because it keeps breaking websites unless i get to the original link.
creator: valenteeduardo39
